title: Ensono Stacks Rest Client Bump Version Generator
description: The @ensono-stacks/rest-client:bump-version generator will bump the version of any generated endpoints

name.description: The endpoint name you want to bump to the specified version.
name.x-prompt: What is the endpoint you want to bump to the specified version?

directory.description: The directory where the endpoint lib is placed.

endpointVersion.description: The version you want to bump your endpoint. Omitting this value will bump latest version + 1.
endpointVersion.x-prompt: What version you want to bump your endpoint to? Skipping will bump +1.
